sect1.title: Changing ownership of the LFS partition
sect1.para: Now we're in chroot, it is a good time to change the ownership of all files and directories that were installed in chapter 5 back to root. Run the following commands to do so:
This command will change the ownership of the root partition to root. 0:0 is used instead of the usual root:root, because the username root can't be resolved because glibc is not yet installed.
